name: grav-apple
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.
